issue.title: [Rust] Conditions that evaluate to an empty result set cause panics in DataFusion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11407](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11407). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a condition creates a result that is all null a NullArray is returned, which cannot be cast through downcast_ref to a typed array, resulting in a panic.

 

See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9331
